    • Method Detail

      • occuranceFindHelper

        public static int occuranceFindHelper​(java.lang.String bigStr,
                                      java.lang.String smallStr,
                                      int index,
                                      int found,
                                      int ocr,
                                      int targetOcr)
        TASK-1 HELPER RECURSIVE FUNCTION-> Search a given string in another given bigger string. The function should return the index of the ith occurrence of the query string and return -1 when the query string doesn’t occur in the big string or the number of occurences is less than i.
        Parameters:
        bigStr - Bigger string
        smallStr - Smaller, target, string
        index - Current position on big string
        found - Current position on small string
        ocr - Current occurance
        targetOcr - Target occurance
        Returns:
        Ocr number, if the match is cannot be found, return -1

      • occuranceFind

        public static int occuranceFind​(java.lang.String bigStr,
                                java.lang.String smallStr,
                                int target)
        TASK-1 FUNCTION, CALLS THE RECURSION HELPER FUNCTION Search a given string in another given bigger string. The function should return the index of the ith occurrence of the query string and return -1 when the query string doesn’t occur in the big string or the number of occurences is less than i.
        Parameters:
        bigStr - Bigger string
        smallStr - Smaller, target, string
        target - Target occurance
        Returns:
        Return the occurence, if the target cannot be found, return -1

      • search

        public static int search​(int[] arr,
                         int leftIndex,
                         int rightIndex,
                         int num1,
                         int num2)
        TASK-2 RECURSIVE FUNCTION -> recursive algorithm to find the number of items in the array between two given integer values.
        Parameters:
        arr - Array
        leftIndex - Starting index
        rightIndex - Size of array
        num1 - The lower bound
        num2 - The upper bound
        Returns:

      • findSubarrayHelper

        public static void findSubarrayHelper​(int[] arr,
                                      int size,
                                      int startIndex,
                                      int index,
                                      int currentSum,
                                      int targetSum)
        TASK-3 RECURSIVE HELPER FUNCTION -> Find contiguous subarray/s that the sum of its/theirs items is equal to a given integer value. NOTE FOR T.A. -> In this function, the subarrays are printed as "from [3] to [5]" that means "3. index of the array to 5. index of the array"
        Parameters:
        arr - Array
        size - Array size
        startIndex - Starting index of the first index of the subarray that the sum of its/theirs items is equal to a given integer value.
        index - Current index of the subarray
        currentSum - Current sum of the subarray
        targetSum - Target sum

      • findSubarray

        public static void findSubarray​(int[] arr,
                                int size,
                                int targetSum)
        TASK-3 FUNCTION, CALLS RECURSIVE HELPER FUNCTION -> find contiguous subarray/s that the sum of its/theirs items is equal to a given integer value.
        Parameters:
        arr - Array
        size - Array size
        targetSum - Target sum
